relics.name: Burning Blood
relics.description: At the end of combat, heal 6 HP.
relics.flavorText: Your body's own blood burns with an undying rage.

relics.name: Cracked Core
relics.description: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Lightning.
relics.flavorText: The mysterious life force which powers the Automatons within the Spire. It appears to be cracked.

relics.name: Pure Water
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a Miracle into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Filtered through fine sand and free of impurities.

relics.name: Ring of the Snake
relics.description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.
relics.flavorText: Made from a fossilized snake. Represents great skill as a huntress.

relics.name: Akabeko
relics.description: Your first Attack each combat deals 8 additional damage.
relics.flavorText: "Muuu~"

relics.name: Anchor
relics.description: Start each combat with 10 Block.
relics.flavorText: Holding this miniature trinket, you feel heavier and more stable.

relics.name: Ancient Tea Set
relics.description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, start the next combat with [E] [E] .
relics.flavorText: The key to a refreshing night's rest.

relics.name: Art of War
relics.description: If you do not play any Attacks during your turn, gain an additional [E] next turn.
relics.flavorText: This ancient manuscript contains wisdom from a past age.

relics.name: Bag of Marbles
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: A once popular toy in the City. Useful for throwing enemies off balance.

relics.name: Bag of Preparation
relics.description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.
relics.flavorText: Oversized adventurer's pack. Has many pockets and straps.

relics.name: Blood Vial
relics.description: At the start of each combat, heal 2 HP.
relics.flavorText: A vial containing the blood of a pure and elder vampire.

relics.name: Bronze Scales
relics.description: Start each combat with 3 Thorns.
relics.flavorText: The sharp scales of the Guardian. Rearranges itself to protect its user.

relics.name: Centennial Puzzle
relics.description: The first time you lose HP each combat, draw 3 cards.
relics.flavorText: Upon solving the puzzle, you feel a powerful warmth in your chest.

relics.name: Ceramic Fish
relics.description: Whenever you add a card to your deck, gain 9 Gold.
relics.flavorText: Meticulously painted, these fish were revered to bring great fortune.

relics.name: Damaru
relics.description: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Mantra.
relics.flavorText: The sound of the small drum keeps your mind awake, revealing a path forward.

relics.name: Data Disk
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 Focus.
relics.flavorText: This disk contains precious data on birds and snakes.

relics.name: Dream Catcher
relics.description: Whenever you Rest, you may add a card into your deck.
relics.flavorText: The northern tribes would often use dream catchers at night, believing they led to self improvement.

relics.name: Happy Flower
relics.description: Every 3 turns, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: This unceasingly joyous plant is a popular novelty item among nobles.

relics.name: Juzu Bracelet
relics.description: Normal enemy combats are no longer encountered in ? rooms.
relics.flavorText: A ward against the unknown.

relics.name: Lantern
relics.description: Start each combat with an additional [E] .
relics.flavorText: An eerie lantern which illuminates only for the wielder.

relics.name: Maw Bank
relics.description: Whenever you climb a floor, gain 12 Gold. No longer works when you spend any Gold at a shop.
relics.flavorText: Surprisingly popular, despite maw attacks being a regular occurrence.

relics.name: Meal Ticket
relics.description: Whenever you enter a shop, heal 15 HP.
relics.flavorText: "Complimentary meatballs with every visit!"

relics.name: Nunchaku
relics.description: Every time you play 10 Attacks, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: A good training tool. Improves the posture and agility of the wielder.

relics.name: Oddly Smooth Stone
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: You have never seen something so smooth and pristine. This must be the work of the Ancients.

relics.name: Omamori
relics.description: Negate the next 2 Curses you obtain.
relics.flavorText: A common charm for staving off vile spirits. This one seems to possess a spark of divine energy.

relics.name: Orichalcum
relics.description: If you end your turn without Block, gain 6 Block.
relics.flavorText: A green tinted metal of an unknown origin. Seemingly indestructible.

relics.name: Pen Nib
relics.description: Every 10th Attack you play deals double damage.
relics.flavorText: Holding the nib, you can see everyone ever slain by a previous owner of the pen. A violent history.

relics.name: Potion Belt
relics.description: Upon pickup, gain 2 Potion slots.
relics.flavorText: I can hold more Potions using this belt!

relics.name: Preserved Insect
relics.description: Enemies in Elite combats have 25% less HP.
relics.flavorText: The insect seems to create a shrinking aura that targets particularly large enemies.

relics.name: Red Skull
relics.description: While your HP is at or below 50%, you have 3 additional Strength.
relics.flavorText: A small skull covered in ornamental paint.

relics.name: Regal Pillow
relics.description: Whenever you Rest, heal an additional 15 HP.
relics.flavorText: Now you can get a proper night's rest.

relics.name: Smiling Mask
relics.description: The Merchant's card removal service now always costs 50 Gold.
relics.flavorText: Mask worn by the Merchant. He must have spares...

relics.name: Snecko Skull
relics.description: Whenever you apply Poison, apply an additional 1 Poison.
relics.flavorText: A snecko skull in pristine condition. Mysteriously clean and smooth, dirt and grime fall off inexplicably.

relics.name: Strawberry
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 7.
relics.flavorText: "Delicious! Haven't seen any of these since the blight." - Ranwid

relics.name: The Boot
relics.description: Whenever you would deal 4 or less unblocked attack damage, increase it to 5.
relics.flavorText: When wound up, the boot grows larger in size.

relics.name: Tiny Chest
relics.description: Every 4th ? room is a Treasure room.
relics.flavorText: "A fine prototype." - The Architect

relics.name: Toy Ornithopter
relics.description: Whenever you use a potion, heal 5 HP.
relics.flavorText: "This little toy is the perfect companion for the lone adventurer!"

relics.name: Vajra
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: An ornamental relic given to warriors displaying glory in battle.

relics.name: War Paint
relics.description: Upon pickup, Upgrade 2 random Skills.
relics.flavorText: In the past, Ironclads would create wards using enchanted war paint before charging into battle.

relics.name: Whetstone
relics.description: Upon pickup, Upgrade 2 random Attacks.
relics.flavorText: "Flesh never beats steel." - Kublai the Great

relics.name: Blue Candle
relics.description:
Unplayable Curse cards can now be played.
Whenever you play a Curse, lose 1 HP and Exhaust it.
relics.flavorText: The flame ignites when shrouded in darkness.

relics.name: Bottled Flame
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose an Attack. Start each combat with this card in your hand.
relics.flavorText: Inside the bottle resides a flame that eternally burns.

relics.name: Bottled Lightning
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a Skill. Start each combat with this card in your hand.
relics.flavorText: Peering into the swirling maelstrom, you see a part of yourself staring back.

relics.name: Bottled Tornado
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a Power card. Start each combat with this card in your hand.
relics.flavorText: The bottle gently hums and whirs.

relics.name: Darkstone Periapt
relics.description: Whenever you obtain a Curse, increase your Max HP by 6.
relics.flavorText: The stone draws power from dark energy, converting it into vitality for the wearer.

relics.name: Duality
relics.description: Whenever you play an Attack, gain 1 temporary Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: "And the sun was extinguished forever, as if curtains fell before it." - Zoroth

relics.name: Eternal Feather
relics.description: For every 5 cards in your deck, heal 3 HP whenever you enter a Rest Site.
relics.flavorText: This feather appears to be completely indestructible. What bird does this possibly come from?

relics.name: Frozen Egg
relics.description: Whenever you add a Power card into your deck, Upgrade it.
relics.flavorText: The egg lies inert and frozen, never to hatch.

relics.name: Gold-Plated Cables
relics.description: Your rightmost Orb triggers its passive an additional time.
relics.flavorText: "Interesting! Even automatons are affected by placebo." - Ranwid

relics.name: Gremlin Horn
relics.description: Whenever an enemy dies, gain [E] and draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: "Gremlin Nobs are capable of growing until the day they die. Remarkable." - Ranwid

relics.name: Horn Cleat
relics.description: At the start of your 2nd turn, gain 14 Block.
relics.flavorText: Pleasant to hold in the hand. What was it for?

relics.name: Ink Bottle
relics.description: Whenever you play 10 cards, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: Once exhausted, appears to refill itself in a different color.

relics.name: Kunai
relics.description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: A blade favored by assassins for its lethality at range.

relics.name: Letter Opener
relics.description: Every time you play 3 Skills in a single turn, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Unnaturally sharp.

relics.name: Matryoshka
relics.description: The next 2 non-Boss chests you open contain 2 Relics.
relics.flavorText: A stackable set of painted dolls. The paint depicts an unknown bird with white eyes and blue feathers.

relics.name: Meat on the Bone
relics.description: If your HP is at or below 50% at the end of combat, heal 12 HP.
relics.flavorText: The meat keeps replenishing, never seeming to fully run out.

relics.name: Mercury Hourglass
relics.description: At the start of your turn, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: An enchanted hourglass that endlessly drips.

relics.name: Molten Egg
relics.description: Whenever you add an Attack into your deck, Upgrade it.
relics.flavorText: The egg of a Phoenix. It glows red hot with a simmering lava.

relics.name: Mummified Hand
relics.description: Whenever you play a Power card, a random card in your hand costs 0 that turn.
relics.flavorText: Frequently twitches, especially when your pulse is high.

relics.name: Ninja Scroll
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add 3 Shivs into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Contains the secrets of assassination.

relics.name: Ornamental Fan
relics.description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 4 Block.
relics.flavorText: The fan seems to extend and harden as blood is spilled.

relics.name: Pantograph
relics.description: At the start of Boss combats, heal 25 HP.
relics.flavorText: "Solid foundations are not accidental. Tools for planning are a must." - The Architect

relics.name: Paper Krane
relics.description: Enemies with Weak deal 40% less damage rather than 25%.
relics.flavorText: An origami of a creature from a past age.

relics.name: Paper Phrog
relics.description: Enemies with Vulnerable take 75% more damage rather than 50%.
relics.flavorText: The paper continually folds and unfolds itself into the shape of a small creature.

relics.name: Pear
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 10.
relics.flavorText: A common fruit before the Spireblight.

relics.name: Question Card
relics.description: Future card rewards have 1 additional card to choose from.
relics.flavorText: "Those with more choices minimize the downside to chaos." - Kublai the Great

relics.name: Self-Forming Clay
relics.description: Whenever you lose HP, gain 3 Block next turn.
relics.flavorText: "Most curious! It appears to form itself loosely on my thoughts! Tele-clay?" - Ranwid

relics.name: Shuriken
relics.description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Lightweight throwing weapons. Recommend going for the eyes.

relics.name: Singing Bowl
relics.description: When adding cards into your deck, you may raise your Max HP by 2 instead.
relics.flavorText: This well-used artifact rings out with a beautiful melody when struck.

relics.name: Strike Dummy
relics.description: Cards containing "Strike" deal 3 additional damage.
relics.flavorText: It's beat up.

relics.name: Sundial
relics.description: Every 3 times you shuffle your draw pile, gain [E] [E] .
relics.flavorText: "Early man's foolish obsession with time caused them to look to the sky for guidance, hoping for something permanent." - Zoroth

relics.name: Symbiotic Virus
relics.description: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Dark.
relics.flavorText: A little bit of bad can do a lot of good...

relics.name: Teardrop Locket
relics.description: Start each combat in Calm.
relics.flavorText: Its owner blind, its contents unseen.

relics.name: The Courier
relics.description: The Merchant restocks cards, relics, and potions. All prices are reduced by 20%.
relics.flavorText: The Merchant's personal pet!

relics.name: Toxic Egg
relics.description: Whenever you add a Skill into your deck, Upgrade it.
relics.flavorText: "What a marvelous discovery! This appears to be the inert egg of some magical creature. Who or what created this?" - Ranwid

relics.name: White Beast Statue
relics.description: Potions always appear in combat rewards.
relics.flavorText: A small white statue of a creature you have never seen before.

relics.name: Bird-Faced Urn
relics.description: Whenever you play a Power card, heal 2 HP.
relics.flavorText: This urn shows the crow god Mazaleth looking mischievous.

relics.name: Calipers
relics.description: At the start of your turn, lose 15 Block rather than all of your Block.
relics.flavorText: "Mechanical precision leads to greatness" - The Architect

relics.name: Captain's Wheel
relics.description: At the start of your 3rd turn, gain 18 Block.
relics.flavorText: Wooden trinket carved with delicate precision. A name is carved into it but the language is foreign.

relics.name: Champion Belt
relics.description: Whenever you apply Vulnerable, apply 1 Weak.
relics.flavorText: Only the greatest may wear this belt.

relics.name: Charon's Ashes
relics.description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Charon was said to be the god of rebirth, eternally dying and reviving in a burst of flame.

relics.name: Cloak Clasp
relics.description: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Block for each card in your hand.
relics.flavorText: A simple but sturdy design.

relics.name: Dead Branch
relics.description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, add a random card into your hand.
relics.flavorText: The branch of a tree from a forgotten era.

relics.name: Du-Vu Doll
relics.description: For each Curse in your deck, start each combat with 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: A doll devised to gain strength from malicious energy.

relics.name: Emotion Chip
relics.description: If you lost HP during the previous turn, trigger the passive ability of all Orbs at the start of your turn.

relics.name: Fossilized Helix
relics.description: Prevent the first time you would lose HP each combat.
relics.flavorText: Seemingly indestructible, you wonder what kind of creature this belonged to.

relics.name: Gambling Chip
relics.description: At the start of each combat, discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards.
relics.flavorText: You can see a small inscription on one side. It reads: "Bear's Lucky Chip!"

relics.name: Ginger
relics.description: You can no longer become Weakened.
relics.flavorText: A potent tool in many tonics.

relics.name: Girya
relics.description: You can now gain Strength at Rest Sites (up to 3 times).
relics.flavorText: This Girya is unfathomably heavy. You could train with this to get significantly stronger.

relics.name: Golden Eye
relics.description: Whenever you Scry, Scry 2 additional cards.
relics.flavorText: See into the minds of those nearby, predicting their future moves.

relics.name: Ice Cream
relics.description: Energy is now conserved between turns.
relics.flavorText: "Delicious!"

relics.name: Incense Burner
relics.description: Every 6 turns, gain 1 Intangible.
relics.flavorText: The smoke imbues its owner with the spirit of the burned.

relics.name: Lizard Tail
relics.description: When you would die, heal to 50% of your Max HP instead (works once).
relics.flavorText: A fake tail to trick enemies during combat.

relics.name: Magic Flower
relics.description: Healing is 50% more effective during combat.
relics.flavorText: A flower long thought extinct, somehow preserved in perfect condition.

relics.name: Mango
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 14.
relics.flavorText: The most coveted forgotten fruit. Impeccably preserved with no signs of Spireblight.

relics.name: Old Coin
relics.description: Upon pickup, gain 300 Gold.
relics.flavorText: Unique coins are highly valued by merchants for their historical value and rare metallic composition.

relics.name: Peace Pipe
relics.description: You can now remove cards from your deck at Rest Sites.
relics.flavorText: Clears the mind and cleanses the soul.

relics.name: Pocketwatch
relics.description: Whenever you play 3 or less cards during your turn, draw 3 additional cards at the start of your next turn.
relics.flavorText: The hands seem stuck on the 3 o'clock position.

relics.name: Prayer Wheel
relics.description: Normal enemies drop an additional card reward.
relics.flavorText: The wheel continues to spin, never stopping.

relics.name: Shovel
relics.description: You can now Dig for relics at Rest Sites.
relics.flavorText: The Spire houses all number of relics from past civilizations and powerful adventurers lost to time. Time to go dig them up!

relics.name: Stone Calendar
relics.description: At the end of turn 7, deal 52 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: The passage of time is imperceptible in the Spire.

relics.name: The Specimen
relics.description: Whenever an enemy dies, transfer any Poison it has to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: "Fascinating! I found a mutated creature demonstrating astounding toxic properties. Storing a sample for later examination." - Ranwid

relics.name: Thread and Needle
relics.description: Start each combat with 4 Plated Armor.
relics.flavorText: Wrapping the magical thread around your body, you feel harder to the touch.

relics.name: Tingsha
relics.description: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: The sound this instrument generates seems to be capable of reverberating to painful levels of volume.

relics.name: Torii
relics.description: Whenever you would receive 5 or less unblocked attack damage, reduce it to 1.
relics.flavorText: Holding the small Torii, you feel a sense of calm and safety drift through your mind.

relics.name: Tough Bandages
relics.description: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, gain 3 Block.
relics.flavorText: Loss gives strength.

relics.name: Tungsten Rod
relics.description: Whenever you would lose HP, lose 1 less.
relics.flavorText: It's very very heavy.

relics.name: Turnip
relics.description: You can no longer become Frail.
relics.flavorText: Best with Ginger.

relics.name: Unceasing Top
relics.description: Whenever you have no cards in hand during your turn, draw a card.
relics.flavorText: The top continues to spin effortlessly as if you were in a dream.

relics.name: Wing Boots
relics.description: You may ignore paths when choosing the next room to travel to 3 times.
relics.flavorText: Stylish.

relics.name: Bloody Idol
relics.description: Whenever you gain Gold, heal 5 HP.
relics.flavorText: The idol now weeps a constant stream of blood.

relics.name: Circlet
relics.description: Collect as many as you can.
relics.flavorText: You ran out of relics to find. Impressive!

relics.name: Cultist Headpiece
relics.description: You feel more talkative.
relics.flavorText: Part of the Flock!

relics.name: Enchiridion
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a random Power card into your hand. It costs 0 for that turn.
relics.flavorText: The legendary journal of an ancient lich.

relics.name: Face Of Cleric
relics.description: At the end of combat, raise your Max HP by 1.
relics.flavorText: Everyone loves Cleric.

relics.name: Golden Idol
relics.description: Enemies drop 25% more Gold.
relics.flavorText: Made of solid gold, you feel richer just holding it.

relics.name: Gremlin Visage
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 Weak.
relics.flavorText: Time to run.

relics.name: Mark of the Bloom
relics.description: You can no longer heal.
relics.flavorText: In the Beyond, thoughts and reality are one.

relics.name: Mutagenic Strength
relics.description: Start each combat with 3 Strength. At the end of your first turn, lose 3 Strength.
relics.flavorText: "The results seem fleeting, triggering when the subject is in danger." - Unknown

relics.name: N'loth's Gift
relics.description: Triple the chance of finding Rare cards from combat rewards.
relics.flavorText: The strange gift from N'loth. Whenever you try and unwrap it, another wrapped box of the same size lies within.

relics.name: N'loth's Hungry Face
relics.description: The next non-Boss chest you open is empty.
relics.flavorText: You feel hungry.

relics.name: Necronomicon
relics.description: The first Attack played each turn that costs 2 or more is played twice. Upon pickup, obtain a special Curse.
relics.flavorText: Only a fool would try and harness this evil power. At night your dreams are haunted by images of the book devouring your mind.

relics.name: Neow's Lament
relics.description: Enemies in your first 3 combats will have 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: The blessing of lamentation bestowed by Neow.

relics.name: Nilry's Codex
relics.description: At the end of your turn, you may shuffle 1 of 3 random cards into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Crafted by the infamous game master himself. Said to expand one's mind.

relics.name: Odd Mushroom
relics.description: When Vulnerable, take 25% more attack damage rather than 50%.
relics.flavorText: "After consuming trichella parastius I felt larger and less... susceptible." - Ranwid

relics.name: Red Circlet
relics.description: Looks very pretty.
relics.flavorText: You ran out of relics. Impressive!

relics.name: Red Mask
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: This very stylish looking mask belongs to the leader of the Red Mask Bandits. Technically that makes you the leader now?

relics.name: Spirit Poop
relics.description: It's unpleasant.
relics.flavorText: The charred remains of your offering to the spirits.

relics.name: Ssserpent Head
relics.description: Whenever you enter a ? room, gain 50 Gold.
relics.flavorText: The most fulfilling of lives is that in which you can buy anything!

relics.name: Warped Tongs
relics.description: At the start of your turn, Upgrade a random card in your hand for the rest of combat.
relics.flavorText: The cursed tongs emit a strong desire to return to where they were stolen from.

relics.name: Astrolabe
relics.description: Upon pickup, Transform 3 cards, then Upgrade them.
relics.flavorText: A tool to glean invaluable knowledge from the stars.

relics.name: Black Blood
relics.description: Replaces Burning Blood. At the end of combat, heal 12 HP.
relics.flavorText: The rage grows darker.

relics.name: Black Star
relics.description: Elites drop an additional relic when defeated.
relics.flavorText: Originally discovered in the town of the serpent, beside a solitary candle.

relics.name: Busted Crown
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Future card rewards have 2 less cards to choose from.
relics.flavorText: The Champ's crown... or a pale imitation?

relics.name: Calling Bell
relics.description: Upon pickup, obtain a unique Curse and 3 relics.
relics.flavorText: This dark iron bell rang 3 times when you found it, but now stays silent.

relics.name: Coffee Dripper
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer Rest at Rest Sites.
relics.flavorText: "Yes, another cup please. Back to work. Back to work!" - The Architect

relics.name: Cursed Key
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Whenever you open a non-Boss chest, obtain a Curse.
relics.flavorText: You can feel the malicious energy emanating from the key. Power comes at a price.

relics.name: Ectoplasm
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer gain Gold.
relics.flavorText: This blob of slime and energy seems to pulse with life.

relics.name: Empty Cage
relics.description: Upon pickup, remove 2 cards from your deck.
relics.flavorText: "How unusual to cage that which you worship." - Ranwid

relics.name: Frozen Core
relics.description: Replaces Cracked Core. If you end your turn with any empty Orb slots, Channel 1 Frost.
relics.flavorText: The crack in your core has been filled with a pulsating cold energy.

relics.name: Fusion Hammer
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer Smith at Rest Sites.
relics.flavorText: Once wielded, the owner can never let go.

relics.name: Holy Water
relics.description: Replaces Pure Water. At the start of each combat, add 3 Miracles into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Collected from a time before the Spire.

relics.name: Hovering Kite
relics.description: The first time you discard a card each turn, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: The Kite floats around you in battle, propelled by a mysterious force.

relics.name: Inserter
relics.description: Every 2 turns, gain 1 Orb slot.
relics.flavorText: Push. Pull. Stack. Repeat.

relics.name: Mark of Pain
relics.description: Gain [R] at the start of your turn. At the start of combat, shuffle 2 Wounds into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: This brand was used by the northern tribes to signify warriors who had mastered pain in battle.

relics.name: Nuclear Battery
relics.description: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Plasma.
relics.flavorText: Ooooh...

relics.name: Pandora's Box
relics.description: Upon pickup, Transform all Strike and Defend cards.
relics.flavorText: You have a bad feeling about opening this.

relics.name: Philosopher's Stone
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. ALL enemies start combat with 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Raw energy emanates from the stone, empowering all nearby.

relics.name: Ring of the Serpent
relics.description: Replaces Ring of the Snake. At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.
relics.flavorText: Your ring has morphed and changed forms.

relics.name: Runic Cube
relics.description: Whenever you lose HP, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: The runes are indecipherable.

relics.name: Runic Dome
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer see enemy intents.
relics.flavorText: The runes are indecipherable.

relics.name: Runic Pyramid
relics.description: At the end of your turn, you no longer discard your hand.
relics.flavorText: The runes are indecipherable.

relics.name: Sacred Bark
relics.description: Double the effectiveness of potions.
relics.flavorText: A bark rumored to originate from the World tree.

relics.name: Slaver's Collar
relics.description: During Boss and Elite combats, gain [E] at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: Rusty miserable chains.

relics.name: Snecko Eye
relics.description: At the start of your turn, draw 2 additional cards. Start each combat Confused.
relics.flavorText: An eye of a fallen snecko. Much larger than you imagined.

relics.name: Sozu
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer obtain potions.
relics.flavorText: You notice that magical liquids seem to lose their properties when near this relic.

relics.name: Tiny House
relics.description:
Upon pickup, obtain 1 potion.
Gain 50 Gold.
Raise your Max HP by 5.
Obtain 1 card.
Upgrade 1 random card.
relics.flavorText: "A near perfect implementation of miniaturization. My finest work to date, but still not adequate." - The Architect

relics.name: Velvet Choker
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You cannot play more than 6 cards per turn.
relics.flavorText: "Immense power, but too limited." - Kublai the Great

relics.name: Violet Lotus
relics.description: Whenever you exit Calm, gain an additional [E] .
relics.flavorText: The old texts describe that the surface of "mana pools" were littered with these flowers.

relics.name: Wrist Blade
relics.description: Attacks that cost 0 deal 4 additional damage.
relics.flavorText: Handy for assassinations.

relics.name: Brimstone
relics.description: At the start of your turn, gain 2 Strength and ALL enemies gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Emanates an infernal heat.

relics.name: Cauldron
relics.description: Upon pickup, brews 5 random potions.
relics.flavorText: The Merchant is actually a rather skilled potion brewer. Buy 4 get 1 free.

relics.name: Chemical X
relics.description: The effects of your cost X cards are increased by 2.
relics.flavorText: WARNING: Do not combine with sugar, spice, and everything nice.

relics.name: Clockwork Souvenir
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 Artifact.
relics.flavorText: "So many intricate gears."

relics.name: Dolly's Mirror
relics.description: Upon pickup, obtain an additional copy of a card in your deck.
relics.flavorText: "I look funny in this."

relics.name: Frozen Eye
relics.description: When viewing your Draw Pile, the cards are now shown in order.
relics.flavorText: Staring into the eye, you see a glimpse of your future.

relics.name: Hand Drill
relics.description: Whenever you break an enemy's Block, apply 2 Vulnerable.
relics.flavorText: "Spirals are dangerous."

relics.name: Lee's Waffle
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 7 and heal all of your HP.
relics.flavorText: "Tastiest treat you will find in all the Spire! Baked today just for you."

relics.name: Medical Kit
relics.description: Unplayable Status cards can now be played. Whenever you play a Status card, Exhaust it.
relics.flavorText: "Has everything you need! Anti-itch, anti-burn, anti-venom, and more!"

relics.name: Melange
relics.description: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, Scry 3.
relics.flavorText: Mysterious sands from an unknown origin. Smells of cinnamon.

relics.name: Membership Card
relics.description: 50% discount on all products!
relics.flavorText: "Bonus membership offer for my most valuable customers!"

relics.name: Orange Pellets
relics.description: Whenever you play a Power, Attack, and Skill in the same turn, remove all of your debuffs.
relics.flavorText: "Made from various fungi found throughout the Spire, they will stave off any affliction."

relics.name: Orrery
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose and add 5 cards to your deck.
relics.flavorText: "Once you understand the universe..." - Zoroth

relics.name: Prismatic Shard
relics.description: Combat reward screens now contain Colorless cards and cards from other colors.
relics.flavorText: Looking through the shard, you are able to see entirely new perspectives.

relics.name: Runic Capacitor
relics.description: Start each combat with 3 additional Orb slots.
relics.flavorText: More is better.

relics.name: Sling of Courage
relics.description: Start each Elite combat with 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: "A handy tool for dealing with particularly tough opponents."

relics.name: Strange Spoon
relics.description: Cards which Exhaust when played will instead discard 50% of the time.
relics.flavorText: Staring at the spoon, it appears to bend and twist around before your eyes.

relics.name: The Abacus
relics.description: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, gain 6 Block.
relics.flavorText: "One...Two...Three..."

relics.name: Toolbox
relics.description: At the start of each combat, choose 1 of 3 random Colorless cards and add the chosen card into your hand.
relics.flavorText: A tool for every job.

relics.name: Twisted Funnel
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 4 Poison to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: "I wouldn't drink out of it."

blights.name: Time Maze
blights.description: You cannot play more than 15 cards per turn.

blights.name: Mimic Infestation
blights.description: Treasure rooms in future acts are replaced by Elites. Elites no longer drop relics.

blights.name: Muzzle
blights.description: You can no longer increase your Max HP. All healing is halved.

blights.name: Accursed
blights.description: Whenever you defeat a Boss, obtain 2 random Curses.

blights.name: Twisting Mind
blights.description: At the end of your turn, add 1 random Status card to the top of your draw pile.

blights.name: Void Essence
blights.description: Gain 1 less [E] at the start of each turn.

blights.name: Ancient Augmentation
blights.description: Enemies start combat with 1 Artifact, 10 Plated Armor, and 10 Regenerate.

potions.name: Attack Potion
potions.description: Choose 1 of 3 random Attack cards to add to your hand, it costs 0 this turn.

potions.name: Blessing of the Forge
potions.description: Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

potions.name: Blood Potion
potions.description: Heal for 20% of your Max HP.

potions.name: Colorless Potion
potions.description: Choose 1 of 3 random Colorless cards to add to your hand, it costs 0 this turn.

potions.name: Flex Potion
potions.description: Gain 5 Strength. At the end of your turn, lose 5 Strength.

potions.name: Power Potion
potions.description: Choose 1 of 3 random Power cards to add to your hand, it costs 0 this turn.

potions.name: Skill Potion
potions.description: Choose 1 of 3 random Skill cards to add to your hand, it costs 0 this turn.

potions.name: Speed Potion
potions.description: Gain 5 Dexterity. At the end of your turn, lose 5 Dexterity.

potions.name: Distilled Chaos
potions.description: Play the top 3 cards of your draw pile.

potions.name: Duplication Potion
potions.description: This turn, your next card is played twice.

potions.name: Elixir
potions.description: Exhaust any number of cards in your hand.

potions.name: Gambler's Brew
potions.description: Discard any number of cards then draw that many.

potions.name: Liquid Memories
potions.description: Choose a card in your discard pile and return it to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

potions.name: Entropic Brew
potions.description: Fill all your empty potion slots with random potions.

potions.name: Essence Of Darkness
potions.description: Channel 1 Dark for each orb slot.

potions.name: Fairy in a Bottle
potions.description: When you would die, heal to 30% of your Max HP instead and discard this potion.

potions.name: Smoke Bomb
potions.description: Escape from a non-boss combat. Receive no rewards.

potions.name: Snecko Oil
potions.description: Draw 5 cards. Randomize the cost of cards in your hand.

creatures.name: Acid Slime (L)

moves.name: Corrosive Spit
moves.description: 11 (12). Shuffles 2 Slimed into your discard pile.

moves.name: Split
moves.description: Splits into 2 Acid Slimes (M) with its current HP.
moves.colouredDesc: [0;2mSplits into [2;31m2 [0;2mAcid Slimes (M) with its current HP.

creatures.description:
30%/40%/30% (40%/30%/30% on A17) chance to use Corrosive Spit/Tackle/Lick.
When its HP is at or below 50%, switches its intent to Split.
Cannot use Tackle twice in a row or Corrosive Spit three times in a row. Cannot use Lick three times in a row (or twice in a row on A17).

creatures.name: Acid Slime (M)

moves.name: Corrosive Spit
moves.description: 7 (8). Shuffles 2 Slimed into your discard pile.

creatures.description:
30%/40%/30% (40%/40%/20% on A17) chance to use Corrosive Spit/Tackle/Lick.
Cannot use Tackle twice in a row or Corrosive Spit three times in a row. Cannot use Lick three times in a row (or twice in a row on A17).

creatures.name: Acid Slime (S)
creatures.description: Starts with Lick on A17, otherwise starts with a random move. Then alternates between moves.

creatures.name: Awakened One

moves.name: Rebirth
moves.description: Removes all debuffs. Removes curiosity. Heals to full. Switches to Awakened Form.
moves.colouredDesc: [0;2mRemoves all debuffs. Removes curiosity. Heals to full. Switches to Awakened Form.

moves.name: Sludge
moves.description: 18. Shuffle 1 Void into the draw pile.

creatures.description:
Whenever you play a power, gains 1 Strength (2 on A19). Starts with 2 Strength on A4. Heals 10 HP at the end of its turn (15 on A19).
When killed for the first time, changes its intent to Rebirth.
Unawakened Form: Starts with Slash. Then has a 25%/75% chance to use Soul Strike/Slash.
Cannot use Slash three times in a row or Soul Strike twice in a row.
Awakened Form: Starts with Dark Echo. Then has a 50%/50% chance to use Tackle/Sludge.
Cannot use any move three times in a row.

creatures.name: Bear
creatures.description: Starts with Bear Hug, then alternates between Lunge and Maul.

creatures.name: Book of Stabbing
creatures.description:
N=2 and increases by 1 when Multi-Stab is used. On A18, N=1+turn number. Whenever it deals unblocked damage, adds a Wound to your discard pile.
Has an 85%/15% chance to use Multi-Stab/Single Stab.

events.name: Gremlin Wheel Game
events.description:

[Punch (downfall only)] Fight. Gain Wheel of Change.
[PREEMPTIVE STRIKE! (as gremlins, get the "lose hp" option)] Gain a random relic and 300 gold.

events.name: Winding Halls
events.description:
[Embrace Madness] Receive 2 Madness. Lose HP equal to 12.5% (18%) of your max HP.
[Focus] Become Cursed - Writhe. Heal 25% (20%) of max HP.
[Retrace Your Steps] Lose 5% of your Max HP.

events.name: World of Goop
events.description:
[Gather Gold] Gain 75 Gold. Lose 11 HP.
[Leave It] Lose 20-50 (35-75) Gold.

events.name: Mind Bloom
events.description:
[I am War] Fight a Boss from Act 1. Obtain a Rare Relic.
[I am Awake] Upgrade all Cards. You can no longer heal.
[I am Rich (before floor 41)] Gain 999 Gold. Cursed - 2 Normality.
[I am Healthy (floor 41+)] Heal to full HP. Cursed - Doubt.
